info.title: Organisations API
info.description: API for the management of organisations and their contact details.

CreateOrganisationRequest.description: Request to create an new organisation

programmeNumber.description: The programme number for the organisation, stored as FEI_NUMBER in NOMIS

vatNumber.description: The VAT number for the organisation, if known

caseloadId.description: The id of the caseload for this organisation, this is an agency id in NOMIS

active.description: Whether the organisation is active or not

createdTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was created

updatedTime.description: Timestamp when the entry was updated

OrganisationAddressDetails.description: An address related to an organisation with descriptions of all reference data

organisationAddressId.description: The id of the organisation address

addressType.description:
The type of address (optional).
      This is a coded value (from the group code ADDRESS_TYPE in reference data).
      The known values are HOME, WORK or BUS (business address).

addressTypeDescription.description: The description of the address type

primaryAddress.description: True if this is the primary address otherwise false

property.description: Building or house number or name

mailAddress.description: Flag to indicate whether mail is allowed to be sent to this address

serviceAddress.description: Flag to indicate whether the organisations service is provided at this address

startDate.description: The start date when this address is to be considered active from

endDate.description: The end date when this address is to be considered no longer active

noFixedAddress.description: Flag to indicate whether this address indicates no fixed address

comments.description: Any additional information or comments about the address

specialNeedsCode.description: Special needs code for this address from reference data ORG_ADDRESS_SPECIAL_NEEDS.

specialNeedsCodeDescription.description: The description of the special needs code

contactPersonName.description: The name of the contact person at this address

businessHours.description: The business hours of the address

phoneNumbers.description: Phone numbers associated with this address

createdBy.description: The id of the user who created the entry

createdTime.description: The timestamp of when the entry was created

updatedBy.description: The id of the user who last updated the entry

updatedTime.description: The timestamp of when the entry was last updated
